comments:
Haojun is a good student.
Sometimes, he works too fast and makes mistakes.

Try to slow down Haojun.
By slowing down, you will be able to be more careful.
More importantly, helps your brain grow stronger.

Slowing down is not fun or easy.
But it is important.

Haojun did not do well on this last exam. I will give Haojun extra help.
Next time, Haojun will definitely do better.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Shujing is wonderful.
Shujing is kind, sincere, and is a joy to have in class.

Shujing is very funny. She has a playful nature and a great sense of humor.
Shujing is creative. She often has interesting solutions for her math problems.

One of Shujing's weaknesses is calculations.
Sometimes, Shujing makes simple mistakes.

But I know Shujing knows how to do it.
All she needs to do is focus more, and I know 100%, these simple mistakes will disappear.

Keep up the good work Shujing.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Austin is wonderful.
Austin is kind, sincere, and is a joy to have in class.

Austin is hardworking. His homework is always completed well. 
Austin often does extra assignments in class, as well as extra homework worksheets. 

I am proud of Austin's work ethic.

Austin cares about his work. That is one of the most important traits for a student to have.
Keep up the good work Austin.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Anderson is wonderful.
Anderson is kind, sincere, and is a joy to have in class.

Anderson brings a fun sense of humor to class. When we do math readings, Anderson often reads with an australian accent that makes all of his classmates laugh.

When Anderson is in the mood, he does excellent work.
On these days, he is super productive and it is wonderful.

Sometimes during class, Anderson likes to brag.
I hope Anderson will brag a little bit less.

Anderson is a strong student.
But the secret to growing stronger and stronger and stronger is to be humble.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Alexander is wonderful.
Alexander is kind, sincere, and is a joy to have in class.

Sometimes Alexander doesn't follow class rules. 
But I know Alexander doesn't do it on purpose.

Alexander is caring. He often looks out for his classmates.
When Anderson's shoe isn't tied, Alexander ties it for him.
When one coloring picture is saved for Felix, Alexander takes it out of the pile and gives it to the teacher so that no one else take Felix's picture.
When the classroom board is dirty, Alexander will often wipe it down, even when the teacher doesn't want him to.

When Alexander wants to be, he can be a very mature young man.
Mr. Lee is always happy to see it.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:

title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Bonnie is wonderful.
Bonnie is kind, sincere, and is a joy to have in class.

Bonnie does good neat work.
She has excellent handwriting.
She has many different colored pens that she likes to write with.

Sometimes Bonnie talks too much to her friends.
But most of the time, Bonnie is a very good student.

Bonnie is capable of a lot.
I hope she will push herself 1 inch further because she can definitely do it.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Stephen is wonderful.
Stephen has a fun sense of humor and brings a happy feeling to the class.

Sometimes Stephen goofs off too much, but for the most part, Stephen's classroom behavior has been excellent.

For this exam, Stephen could've done much better.
Stephen usually does very well with fractions.
Somehow on this exam, Stephen seems to have forgotten it.

Stephen doesn't show much work and still often gets the answer correct. This is a bad habit. For 4th grade, it is okay. But math will get much harder. Showing work is a very important skill.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Felix is a good student who cares very much about his work.
He often asks questions, and after school, will do extra work with the teacher.

Sometimes, Felix does not get a good score on quizzes or exams.
However, Felix is very capable of doing them. One time, he solved a super long division question over 10 digits that he wrote all for himself.

When Felix is focused and attentive, Felix's abilities are much stronger.

I know Felix will do much better on the next exam.
We will do extra practice and make it happen.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Stephanie is wonderful.
Stephanie is kind and considerate, and is a joy to have in class.
You can always count on Stephanie to take care of her friends.

Sometimes, Stephanie is super neat, and her work is super good. 
Sometimes, Stephanie is a potato.

Stephanie didn't do that well on our first exam.
I know Stephanie will do better on the next one because Stephanie is going to have extra practice.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Usually, Jayden is sweet, caring, and wonderful. 
Sometimes, Jayden is a grumpy potato.

But that's okay.
Everyone has good days and bad days.

Jayden is very capable of mathematics.
But when he is in the mood to work, he can do very good work.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:
Ivy is wonderful.
Ivy is kind and considerate, and is a joy to have in class.

I am very proud of Ivy always asking lots of questions.
I am very proud of Ivy being super focused during exams.

I believe a very important thing for Ivy, is when Ivy believes in Ivy.
Ivy always does great work when she believes in herself.

Keep up the good work Ivy.
Keep growing stronger and stronger and stronger.
title: Spring Exam 1

comments:

I hope Vincent doesnt fall into this trap.
I hope Vincent stays calm like a cucumber.

Keep growing stronger and stronger and stronger Vincent.
There are many more things to discover,
Many more things to create.

comments:
Owen is wonderful.
Owen is kind, sincere, and is a joy to have in class.

Owen is strong at math. He picks up new ideas quickly and has a good feeling for numbers.
But Owen has a big weakness: His work is messy.

This messiness often leads to careless mistakes.

Try to be a little bit neater Owen. 
You will make less careless mistakes. You will see big improvements in your math.
